VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Delivery Vans. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(4 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1990, 1998, 2001, 2008}.
